description:
This course will teach you about the way in which Hypnosis and Hypnotherapy is used today.

This course will take approx 90 minutes to complete.

This course is based upon my ten years of experience.

If you want to learn more about Hypnosis and the how and why it works, this course will be for you!

You will hear some of my case studies and be able to relate to these in your life.what modality is used for which issue.

This is presented using power point presentation with my narration.

This course is interesting because you will hear about some of my case studies, these examples will help you to identify common issues people may have and will clearly show you how and why Hypnosis was an effective tool in helping them to overcome the issue.
title: Introduction to Hypnotherapy and the secrets within.
